mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.subsidytype AS "subsidytype", a.unitname AS "unitname", a.ispaytax AS "ispaytax", a.year17 AS "year17", a.year18 AS "year18", a.year19 AS "year19", a.year20 AS "year20", a.year21 AS "year21", a.year22 AS "year22", a.year23 AS "year23", a.year24 AS "year24", a.year25 AS "year25", a.year26 AS "year26"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_incosubsidy( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, projectcode, projectname, subsidytype, unitname, ispaytax, year17, year18, year19, year20, year21, year22, year23, year24, year25, year26 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{subsidytype}, #{unitname}, #{ispaytax}, #{year17}, #{year18}, #{year19}, #{year20}, #{year21}, #{year22}, #{year23}, #{year24}, #{year25}, #{year26} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_incosubsidy SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, subsidytype = #{subsidytype}, unitname = #{unitname}, ispaytax = #{ispaytax}, year17 = #{year17}, year18 = #{year18}, year19 = #{year19}, year20 = #{year20}, year21 = #{year21}, year22 = #{year22}, year23 = #{year23}, year24 = #{year24}, year25 = #{year25}, year26 = #{year26} WHERE id = #{id}
